short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to get information of a website.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: get all the root certificate of TLS connections with the help of the back-end python code in the cloud server, for imporving the acknowledgement for the user when they visits a webiste.
